lead_paragraph: A Sports of The Times column in some editions on Saturday, about the memories of the former Phillies pitchers Robin Roberts and Larry Christenson, misstated the size of a ball that Roberts once hit for a home run in a Chicago version of softball. It had a 16-inch circumference, not diameter.
